definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: What remains of IndyMac's franchise is of questionable value , to put it charitably .
sentences.chinese: 怜悯的说，因地美特许权价值还剩几许值得怀疑，。

sentences.english: Several concessionaires were asked to disclose their revenues and declined.
sentences.chinese: 几个特许经营者被要求披露其收入和下降。

sentences.english: The most common source is to be granted a monopoly by the government, either through patents, in which case the monopoly is temporary, or through a government franchise.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的是由政府授予的垄断，比如说专利或特许权。

sentences.english: Afore-mentioned concessionary products can use number of international Olympic committee.
sentences.chinese: 上述特许产品可以使用国际奥委会标记。

sentences.english: In contrast, out-of-state processors were required to submit title certificates or police certificates.
sentences.chinese: 可是州外的收集者却要提交特许证或警察发给的证书。

sentences.english: The company was chartered by the US Congress in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 房地美公司在1970年由美国国会授权特许经营。

sentences.english: So Falvey decided to get into the franchising business, too.
sentences.chinese: 所以福尔维决定进入特许经营业务了。

sentences.english: Fischer is currently working for Disney on the Tron franchise.
sentences.chinese: 费谢尔现在在为Tron特许的迪斯尼工作。

sentences.english: 1214 - University of Oxford receives its charter.
sentences.chinese: 1214年的今天，牛津大学获得特许执照。

sentences.english: K. C. is a Fellow of the Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development.
sentences.chinese: 是英国特许人事和发展学会的成员。

sentences.english: The stretch the villagers have their eye on is also part of a concession.
sentences.chinese: 村民眼馋的林带也属于特许伐木区。

sentences.english: The Environmental Charter High School, in Lawndale, California, teaches all standard academic subjects.
sentences.chinese: 环保特许高中位于加利福尼亚州的劳恩代尔。

sentences.english: Another is its right source that was granted from the king.
sentences.chinese: 从权利渊源来看，它得利于国王授予的特许权。

sentences.english: Sup Sam Hung in Guangzhou is a licensed foreign trade organization with special authority from the Qing government.
sentences.chinese: 清代广州十三行是政府特许的外贸垄断组织。

sentences.english: That's what MFV Expositions provides to your franchise company.
sentences.chinese: 这就是MFV展览提供给你的特许经营公司。
如何获得卡乐咪特许加盟信息？

definition: to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
